messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
There’s no mountain here, but I’m
dressed to hike! Gahaha! Here goes!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Oh, yeah!
A refreshing battle that was!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
You can find the same kinds of
Pokémon in all sorts of places.There’s no law saying a Hiker can’t
go searching off in the mountains!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
If you meet someone in the mountains,
they’re no longer strangers.Meet them twice, and they’re your
friend!
